archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.7: Threat information should be analysed on a regular basis by skilled and experienced analysts (e.g. threat intelligence analysts) to produce requirements-driven threat intelligence that:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
